name: Shrinking Planet Replica
description:
This Is An Inspirational Arcade Game

This Game Is Originally Made By Brackeys For Ludum Dare

This Game Is A Replica Made By Myself For Learning and Fun

Objective: Avoid The Meteors and Make It To The Last Of The Time

Controls: A or (Left Arrow) To Move Left, D or (Right Arrow) To Move Right

Assets By Brackeys and Opensource
